query: SELECT COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'justificativasAlerta' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'motivo';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3v7At4WPQpm4aRf.9e6a8ae0e28e --database bSA4q7aMJsJeSmafooCq7A --execute SELECT COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'justificativasAlerta' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'motivo';
